name: HapiPodcastJ
tagline: Android Podcast Player - Fork of Hapi Podcast
body:
## HapiPodcastJ

This is Hapi Podcast J, a fork of [Hapi Podcast] [play],
an Android app for playing podcasts.

Hapi Podcast and Hapi Podcast J are open source software released under the GPL.
The [git repository] [git] includes the full history that is available in the
Hapi Podcast [svn repository] [svnrepo].

  [play]: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=info.xuluan.podcast
  [svnrepo]: http://code.google.com/p/hapiboke/
  [git]: https://github.com/jimmc/HapiPodcastJ

It has a few new features and a rearranged UI.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
